__e: Get him to talk a bit more.
If that's your husband, find out where he is, but keep on talking.
Talk to him so I hear his voice.
You can save the M-5 if you talk to it and make it stop the attack.
Dear God in heaven, stop him.
Let's get out of here and leave. Tell him to please stop the car and let us out.
When the doctor comes, send him in.
Go, take the bribe; and bring me Pothinus.
Admit him to die on the point of my sword.
If you have not yet registered, please do so now and discover all the advantages!
Since you are here to merely say good-bye, please do so, now.
For God's sake, my son if you have something to confess, do it now.
